replies.body: The Yasuo mains should be flooding this thread any minute now. Any... minute...

> [{quoted}](name=Yazuo,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Atd160Ab,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-18T14:50:55.601+0000)
>
> It's because you're garbo

Aaaaaand there they are.
There they are :P
They sure fail to disappoint.

It's sad they fulfill the worst expectations.

Very sad :(
At least they managed to fulfill SOME expectations.
I'm not a Yasuo main but the circlejerk is getting pretty sad
they don't flood, they seem to just breeze on in.

> [{quoted}](name=Igglet,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Atd160Ab,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-18T14:44:22.601+0000)
>
> The Yasuo mains should be flooding this thread any minute now. Any... minute...

I do that too.... but for a different reason https://s18.postimg.org/ypjtg95fd/yas.png
When you've legit lost track of how many Yasuo threads you've seen in the past 2 months, you know something is wrong.
any character that's kind of hard to play against gets hundreds of threads complaining about how busted they are
Renekton is a lane bully, he's hard to play against. I haven't seen any complaints about him in ages, I wonder why... Oh that's right, it's because he's not broken.
I have no personal issues with yasuo, but I can accept that enough people view him as a problem that I may be wrong about his a balance.

Because he totally shuts down nearly all his prospective enemy laners (at mid) with no real weaknesses of his own apart from very specific counterpicking. Now, if he couldn't hold that tornado to zone you out for an entire minion wave, maybe he would be a lot less of an issue. Give him the TF gold card treatment and he's golden (pun totally intended).
nah, just everyday boards for you
this is how I feel when a teammate picks {{champion:64}} .......
He's one of the few champs I just can't stand playing with or against. Dodge 100% fuck yasuo

i hate laning against one. Just in case he gets ahead; no one roams/ganks him. I feel I'm fucked b/c of his itemization and scaling. Yet, I'm always roaming and ganking to make sure he doesn't get ahead. Comps will build around him too; so it makes no sense ppl won't prioritize the enemies focus point.

Also, dude moves like the wind but hits like an asteroid.

The reason Yasuo mains will flood is because he is not difficult to play against, most people just bitch because they can't play him well enough to know how to beat him.

In my opinion, the best way to learn how to play against a champ is to play it. People are too stupid to realize this and it ends up resulting in people bitching about Yas when they have never played him and only the Yas mains that know how to play against him. If would just learn a bit about his kit, no one would be bitching.

If you want, I can put a very detailed explanation about how to beat him.
Even Apdo said that Yasuo is broken. I'm sure he would like you to teach him how to play.
Apdo used the word "broken" so many times without any explanation, I couldn't give less cares about his opinion.

I haven't heard any explanation as to why he's not broken either, so I couldn't care less about the opinions of everyone defending Yasuo either.

Besides, Apdo doesn't need to explain himself, not to us.

That's gotta be the dumbest shit I've heard today.

_"He's a high ranked player, so he's always right and you are wrong assuming he isn't."_

First of all, don't put words in my mouth, makes you look pathetic.

Second of all, if I'd really have to blindly believe someone, of course I'd choose him over you.

> [{quoted}](name=Ulriah,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Atd160Ab,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2016-10-18T15:35:35.086+0000)
>
> Even Apdo said that Yasuo is broken. I'm sure he would like you to teach him how to play.

He is broken. He's supposed to be risky to play but his ult is incredibly forgiving. Not to mention windwall doesn't actually require aiming. You just hit the button in any direction and the projectile vacuum will suck it all up.
Not only his ult, but also his build. He only needs 2 offensive items, then he can build tanky and still be a threat, making him a very mobile bruiser.

I'm just going to note that its not only a yasuo problem assassins and fighters should not be able to build tanky and still do damage no one likes to play vs a tank ekko tank yasuo hell i hate irelia and she builds almost the same shit they need to make tank item give tank stats and not a bunch of damage to boot (Cough Triforce Cough) I 100% wouldn't mind yasuo 2 shotting me at full build with all damage items because i know he would be easy to kill with focus and well placed cc but thats just my two cents

Yasuo is indeed a very strong laner, and thats probably the main reason why. Luckily most people you will be facing wont play at a challenger level either, so i dont think he is too hard to deal with in lower elos.

True, but it's the simple fact that he has the potential to 1v5 that's threatening. A lot of people ban Yasuo because they don't want their teammates to pick him, I know I would suck balls if I were to play him, but when he falls into the hands of a OTP, a smurf, or a very dedicated Yasuo main, he can be really dangerous.

Yasuo cant 1v5 if your team plays it just decently, or unless he is 20/0 and 5 levels ahead of everyone. cc him and nuke him, its like a Yi lategame sort of. Many champs have the 1v5 potential if the enemy team majorly screws up and the other player is strong and plays it well. If you think the 1v5 potential is what makes him OP then you are mistaken, and the Vayne along with many other adc's would be considered OP aswell. He is strong, but i dont think it has much to do with 1v5 potential.
It's because you're garbo
Pretty sure he says "Hotdoggi" Which is why I will complain about any skin he gets that doesn't involve him wielding a sausage.
Hasaki. He says Hasaki. I like the Hot dog skin idea though. There have been many good Ideas for the chef line since it debuted.

> Hasaki. He says Hasaki.

No way!!! My entire life has been a lie!!! We all were so convinced he said Hotdoggi and now the blinding light which opened our eyes to this panful truth!!!
This comment alone has put me over my daily allowance of sarcasm.
No no no, he's says "hasakey" because Yasuo never gets locked out of his house.

>silver 5 telling a diamond 5 that he's "garbo"


lol

I'm hoping Azir comes back when Riot realizes they deep fried him, as an aside Yasuo really only has one definitive counter in lane and even then its not a 100% he's doomed counter either. {{champion:90}} has all the tools to make a Yasuo cry, his Q is a long duration silence that isn't a projectile, his W will just chase him down and chew him up (if he doesn't use them to dash to you can stab you repeatedly anyway), your E again can't be stopped by Windwall and lets u get some CS from a long range so he can't get up in your face, R is a LITERAL F*** You button to Yasuo and Malz passive can deny him a knock up and thus ultimate. 

That aside I also share a deep hatred of Yasuo, champion is just living embodiment of BS, shield makes poke super hard to get off, Windwall means you need to go a champion without any projectiles like Malz for fear he'll stop your stun, poke or god forbid your ult (he destroyed my Ez ult on more than one occasion T_T), his E is the most obnoxious spell in the game since it has a literal  0.1 second CD so long as he has fresh targets to dash to (cough Minions cough), and his ult CCs forever while hitting like a truck and giving him a free AA too. Q is also annoying since its an AoE AA that makes BT super efficient on him, had a Yasuo go 12-1 in a ranked game the other night cuz my mid lane picked TF into him, and fed. Yasuo was able to 1v3 anyone on my team just cuz of his insane mobility after he got PD, IE and BT...
enemy picked yasuo. time for a free +22

Ehh I just play {{champion:25}} into him.

Land one Q and the game auto-quits from inactivity.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Atd160Ab,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-18T14:46:29.030+0000)
>
> Ehh I just play {{champion:25}} into him.
> 
> Land one Q and the game auto-quits from inactivity.

Lol when a meme gets downvoted by bandwagon Yasuo haters with no sense of humor
I also wondered why it gets downvoted when it's just a simple joke.
I was wondering that too, but I didn't want to be the first reply to my own comment xD
{{champion:122}}  Uhhh, where is he? Did he go afk?

"Bullshit aside Yasuo is a broken champion. People say he's a high skillcap champion, but the secret with Yasuo is knowing how to control yourself while playing such a overpowered champion. Yasuo's weakness comes from the fact that he is too strong. His laning phase is so strong that after the laning phase people do not know how to keep calm and throw the game."

And you take that from a player who is known to have the worst mechanics out of the top players. He is rank one because of his game knowledge and decision making, not his superb skills and mechanics. He is of course superior to lower levels of play, but he is one of the worst in terms of mechanics among his peers in his elo.
He's one of the few that's able to go toe to toe in lane with Faker because he has bad mechanics? Think again.
he's the best league player in the world. who the hell else would i take opinions from? you?
